extendedInfo.description: Tower is made of colorfull blocks in our puzzle game. What happens when You remove some blocks from the Tower? It should collapse. Fortunately, no construction disaster will happen here. Instead of that, new Blocks will appear so that You could to remove more blocks and gain more points.Puzzle game Blocks: Tower is played by some rules that You have to follow:You may remove only group of tiles of the same color that are connected to each other vertically or horizontally.Group of tiles has to consist of at least three blocks.The more tiles You remove at one time, the more points You'll get.After gaining 50 points you get an extra chance - "drill", which removes the entire column. Use it when you have no other moves or at any other time during the game.The Game ends when there are no more tiles to remove.Blocks: Tower helps You develope logical thinking and fight boredom.Blocks: Tower gives You some basic options:There are three levels of the game: easy, medium and hard.The higher level of the game, the narrower tower board gets.The best results for each level are saved.The game is very simple (intuitive).Everyone can play it, but not everyone becomes a Block Master. Will You?Get if for free!Have fun!

reviews.title: My Brain Hurts!
reviews.comment: Very good puzzle game! Needs only basic permissions, and you don\'t need to buy \'game coins\' with real money so that gives the game extra Kudos.  Well done developers!
reviews.author: Warf White
